name: py-dataclasses
description: A backport of the dataclasses module for Python 3.6

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependent_to.name: py-black
dependent_to.description:
Black is the uncompromising Python code formatter. By using it, you
agree to cede control over minutiae of hand-formatting. In return, Black
gives you speed, determinism, and freedom from pycodestyle nagging about
formatting.

dependent_to.name: py-tatsu
dependent_to.description:
TatSu (the successor to Grako) is a tool that takes grammars in a
variation of EBNF as input, and outputs memoizing (Packrat) PEG parsers
in Python.

dependent_to.name: py-transformers
dependent_to.description:
State-of-the-art Natural Language Processing for TensorFlow 2.0 and
PyTorch

dependent_to.name: py-argon2-cffi
dependent_to.description: The secure Argon2 password hashing algorithm..

dependent_to.name: py-ml-collections
dependent_to.description:
ML Collections is a library of Python collections designed for ML
usecases.

dependent_to.name: py-yaspin
dependent_to.description: Yet Another Terminal Spinner

dependent_to.name: py-h11
dependent_to.description: A pure-Python, bring-your-own-I/O implementation of HTTP/1.1

dependent_to.name: py-correctionlib
dependent_to.description: A generic correction library

dependent_to.name: py-omegaconf
dependent_to.description:
A hierarchical configuration system, with support for merging
configurations from multiple sources (YAML config files,
dataclasses/objects and CLI arguments) providing a consistent API
regardless of how the configuration was created.

dependent_to.name: py-rich
dependent_to.description:
Rich is a Python library for rich text and beautiful formatting in the
terminal.

dependent_to.name: py-anyio
dependent_to.description:
High level compatibility layer for multiple asynchronous event loop
implementations.

dependent_to.name: py-torchgeo
dependent_to.description:
TorchGeo: datasets, transforms, and models for geospatial data. TorchGeo
is a PyTorch domain library, similar to torchvision, that provides
datasets, transforms, samplers, and pre-trained models specific to
geospatial data.

dependent_to.name: py-wsproto
dependent_to.description:
This repository contains a pure-Python implementation of a WebSocket
protocol stack. It's written from the ground up to be embeddable in
whatever program you choose to use, ensuring that you can communicate
via WebSockets, as defined in RFC6455, regardless of your programming
paradigm.

dependent_to.name: py-sphinxcontrib-bibtex
dependent_to.description: A Sphinx extension for BibTeX style citations.

dependent_to.name: py-pyvista
dependent_to.description: Easier Pythonic interface to VTK.

dependent_to.name: py-datasets
dependent_to.description:
Datasets is a lightweight library providing two main features: one-line
dataloaders for many public datasets and efficient data pre-processing.

dependent_to.name: py-boost-histogram
dependent_to.description: The Boost::Histogram Python wrapper.

dependent_to.name: py-dvc
dependent_to.description: Git for data scientists - manage your code and data together.

dependent_to.name: py-werkzeug
dependent_to.description: The Swiss Army knife of Python web development

dependent_to.name: py-pytools
dependent_to.description: A collection of tools for Python

dependent_to.name: py-pydantic
dependent_to.description: Data validation and settings management using Python type hinting.

dependent_to.name: py-horovod
dependent_to.description:
Horovod is a distributed deep learning training framework for
TensorFlow, Keras, PyTorch, and Apache MXNet.

dependent_to.name: py-owslib
dependent_to.description:
OWSLib is a Python package for client programming with Open Geospatial
Consortium (OGC) web service (hence OWS) interface standards, and their
related content models.

dependent_to.name: py-torch
dependent_to.description:
Tensors and Dynamic neural networks in Python with strong GPU
acceleration.

dependent_to.name: py-tensorflow-datasets
dependent_to.description:
tensorflow/datasets is a library of datasets ready to use with
TensorFlow.
